headline: Four Appointed by President in Purge of Pentagon’s Civilian Hierarchy
text: WASHINGTON — A purge of the senior civilians at the Pentagon and the ascension of a similar hard-line policy official to a top job at the National Security Agency have prompted concerns that the Trump administration may be planning new punishments for Iran and releasing classified documents about President Trump’s interactions with Russia.
snippet: The arrival of the new officials has prompted concerns. Their backgrounds offer insights into their policies.
